mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def optimize_function(fun, x0, alpha, deltas, where):
    x = x0
    direction = deltas[where]
    direction *= np.mean(np.abs(direction))
    x -= alpha * direction * x
    x[x < 0] = 0
    score = fun(x)
    return (score, x)

def optimize_function(fun, x0, alpha, deltas, where):
    x = x0
    direction = deltas[where]

    x -= alpha * direction / x
    x[x < 0] = 0
    score = fun(x)
    return (score, x)

def optimize_function(fun, x0, alpha, deltas, where):
    x = x0
    direction = deltas[where]

    return (score, x)
